events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen is cracked and there are scratches on the body. This is very disappointing.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to reported broken screen and scratches by the customer.
Support agent JohnDoe has been assigned to handle the case involving the damaged laptop.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop. Let's work together to resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and scratches so we can assess the situation properly?
Here are the pictures showing the cracked screen and multiple scratches on the laptopâ€™s casing as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement unit if possible, thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your replacement request. A new laptop will be shipped within 3 business days with tracking details sent to you.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement laptop and that it is in perfect condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is working perfectly now. Thank you for your help.
We are glad to hear the issue is resolved. Closing this case now, and please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
